events.message: We have received John Smith's application for the Senior Software Engineer role and all required documents are included.
John Smith's application for the engineering team has been categorised as a software developer position based on his resume keywords.
Recruiter Anna Lee has been assigned to manage the screening and interview process for John Smith's software engineer application.
Initial phone screening completed with John Smith; candidate demonstrated strong experience in software development and problem-solving skills.
John Smith responded promptly and confirmed availability for the next technical interview round on April 15th.
Technical interview with John Smith is scheduled for April 15th at 10 am to evaluate coding and system design skills.
